entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
